title: Interpretation of a handsome man in a dream and a handsome young man in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the vision of a handsome young man, unknown, strange or known, a strange man looking at me and marrying a handsome man. The meaning of the appearance of a handsome man in a dream The interpretation is good, because it expresses good luck or abundance of food, and the elegant young man in visions is good news and good news. A handsome or handsome young man in a single dream If a girl sees a handsome young man entering her house and his face is glowing, this indicates good luck in knocking on her door. If he speaks or sees that he is looking at her and looking at her with admiration, this is his interpretation of happy news on the emotional level. If he extends his right hand to shake her, the dream indicates the blessing of the people of that house If she sees that he enters her room as if he is not a stranger, this is its interpretation of marriage If he enters the house laden with gifts, this is his interpretation of a job or a job A handsome and elegant man in a married dream She who sees in her dream that her husband has become more handsome and handsome, receives good news from him If the husband appears in elegant and noble clothes, they will witness a major change in life, especially in livelihood, and the change will be proportional to the value and beauty of the clothes. A married woman who sees a man A stranger entered her house and sat with her or spoke to her kindly and humbly and then said something to her, then his words came true and the man may be an angel or a prophet of the prophets and this interpretation if the stranger announced it and said for example: I am the Prophet of God Joseph If the dream is true or its causes are fulfilled, then this woman's problems will disappear and be replaced by joy and happiness A handsome man or a young man in a pregnant woman's dream If a woman sees a handsome man entering her house and promising her a male child, then she will give birth to a female, and if he announces her birth to her, then she will give her the birth of a boy If she is given good news of a remembrance and says: Name so-and-so (Ahmed, Mahmoud, for good will affect her with the same meaning as the name mentioned by the handsome man in the dream) It is better in the dream for the young man or young man to be a stranger, and this indicates the strength and meaning of the symbol, and it is not bad to see a handsome man you know. Seeing the dead in a dream as if he is a handsome young man He sees in his dream as if a dead man revives his image and appearance in another way, and he seemed to be wearing a new dress and his face is shining. With light, these are the good deeds and good deeds of the seer. A woman who sees her deceased father or brother has returned to the world with a beautiful face and good features. A journey, or a wish for someone who is closer to her than ever. If you see yourself beautiful in your dreams, you will prove that you are a brilliant, flattering person. If you see good appearances in others, this means that you will enjoy the trust of loyal people. Interpretation of a dream about a handsome man. A handsome man, when one sees him in a dream, is evidence that this dreamer will obtain good wealth and abundant living, which will come to that person. Interpretation of a dream about a handsome man for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees a handsome man or a young man entering the house above her, this indicates the good luck that will come her way. But if this handsome man looks at her, it will be a change for her on an emotional level. And if the handsome young man shakes this single girl's right hand, blessings descend on the people of the house. Interpretation of a dream about a handsome man for a woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about an old man by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an old man in a dream with a girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, if the old man is a strange old man, an old old man, is a vision that has become big for him. Ibn Sirin and moreThe old man in a dream is one of the relatively strange dreams that we see in many different forms that bring us many important meanings and associations in life, such as sometimes we see an old person in a dream trying to attack us or an old person who gives us something in life because it contains many The signs and signals that one must look for in public life and know them completely and correctly because old age is one of the stages of life in which we reach the end of life. Imam Ibn Sirin, the great and famous dream interpreter, explained to us the vision of an old man in a dream with many important interpretations and meanings that It must be received by a person. Interpretation of an old man in a dream: Seeing an old man in a dream is a sign of kindness and sustenance. Dreaming of old age means failure in any kind of undertaking. To see an old woman in a dream who has returned to youth in a dream is evidence of the end of poverty and troubles. And if you dream of old age, This indicates that a foolish opinion will bring you the curse of your relatives. If a girl dreams that she is accused of being older than her, this means that she will be in bad company, and her denial of some things will make fun of her. If she sees herself looking old, this indicates possible illness or unsatisfactory risks, but If he sees an old lover, he will risk losing him. Interpretation of an old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an old man in a dream is evidence of a person’s feeling of contentment and satisfaction with life. When a young woman sees an old man in a dream, this is a sign that goodness is coming to her. And seeing a woman that she has become An old man in a dream is evidence of her great wisdom and appreciation for all people. Seeing an old man with poor eyesight in a dream is evidence that you will get rid of problems and end them completely. Seeing an old man in a dream is evidence of problems that a person may face in his life. Seeing a sick old man in a dream is evidence of... A person's incapacity and loss of strength. As for someone who sees an old woman searching for water, it is a sign of poverty, sadness, and drought. An old man who approaches a sick person in a dream is evidence of his death in the near future. Seeing an old woman in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money. If you see an old woman in a bad way in a dream, this indicates problems and wars that one will engage in. As for a man who sees an old woman in a dream who is not a Muslim, it is evidence that money is forbidden. A man seeing a naked woman is evidence of being exposed to something hidden in his life and tarnishing his reputation. When he sees A man sees an old woman in his house, this is a sign that good things are coming to him. The old man was kicked out of the house in a dream, a sign of trouble. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign of kindness, love and happiness. Seeing a religious old woman in a girl’s dream is evidence of Marrying R

title: Interpretation of aunt in a dream Seeing mother's sister in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead, unmarried, pregnant aunt, a married aunt’s daughter, my aunt dreaming of Ibn Sirin’s house. Interpretation of the aunt in a dream: Seeing the aunt in a dream is a warning against falling into disobedience and committing sins or transgressions, especially in a man’s dream, if he sees a man in his dream as if he were marrying his aunt, for example. Seeing an aunt in a dream symbolizes optimism, especially if the aunt appears in the dream as wearing elegant and clean clothes or is seen wearing a veil. Interpretation of a dream about an aunt for a single woman: An unmarried or unmarried girl sees her aunt in a dream as if she is giving or wearing a ring, a dress, or a burqa that symbolizes her aunt’s desire. In marrying her sister’s son to one of her sons, and her aunt tried to achieve this. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, like her aunt, wearing new shoes, for example, symbolizes the fulfillment of that girl’s desire, which may be travel, work, or marriage. Interpretation of the aunt in a dream For a married woman: An aunt in a married woman’s dream is evidence of kindness and livelihood, especially if the married woman sees that her aunt is visiting her house, feeding her or drinking water, or sleeping in her bed. This vision may foretell pregnancy. A newly married woman. Interpretation of the aunt in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for the pregnant woman who sees in her dream that her aunt is in her house or sleeping in her bed, this portends to the pregnant woman the birth of a male child. We agreed in our previous topic that seeing the dead in a dream is a real vision, because they are in a house beyond. It is the abode of truth, and we are in this world, which is the abode of falsehood. Glory and Glory Seeing a maternal aunt in pure white clothes in a dream benefits the good deeds of whoever sees it. Seeing a maternal aunt in other situations may be a warning to the ruler urging him to abandon sins and draw closer to God Almighty with good deeds and prayer. Interpretation of a dead or deceased aunt in a dream: Seeing a deceased aunt as a gift or something given to a fortuneteller, such as candy. , watch, ring, etc., is good news of the arrival of happy news. Seeing the dreamer as if his living aunt had died or was dying may symbolize a crisis that the aunt herself is going through or that the dreamer is going through. Seeing the aunt dying and then coming back to life is A sign of the goodness and longevity of the fortuneteller or the aunt herself. Interpretation of the aunt’s house in a dream. The large, spacious house of the aunt in a dream is a symbol of goodness, happiness and prosperity, whether in a man’s dream or in a woman’s dream in general. Seeing one’s aunt’s house cramped or dirty and impure in a dream is disturbing and unpleasant because seeing it indicates To anxiety, distress, and misfortunes. The best dream is for the dreamer to see himself leaving his aunt’s cramped house, as it portends comfort and comfort after hardship. Interpretation of kissing and hugging your aunt in a dream. Kissing your aunt’s arms with great longing in a dream indicates a positive transformation in the dreamer’s life. Seeing your aunt kissing and hugging her in an unmarried woman’s dream It indicates her marriage after a long wait. In a married woman’s dream, she spreads the good news of pregnancy after a long wait. In a man’s dream, it is a sign of happiness and satisfaction after troubles, sorrow, and worries. It is the marriage of a single person and work for the unemployed. Vision.

title: What do you know about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees a political figure in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a political figure in a dream: A person may dream of the President of the Republic or the ministers, and he may see one of the princes in his sleep, noting that the interpretations of political figures differ from one personality to another according to their position in the country. From this vision.Interpretation of a dream about an important person in a dreamCommentators said that a smile in a dream has a meaning, and also expressions of anger and reprimand have a completely different meaning. If the dreamer sees in the vision that the president is looking at him and smiling at him with a smile of satisfaction, then the dream at that time will be praiseworthy and indicates three signs: First: That the fortuneteller will be one of those who have money in this world, knowing that the money he will obtain will be a lot and will reach the level of wealth and luxury. This blessing is great and must be enjoyed within the limits of Sharia law. And do not spend it on what makes God angry. Second: The dreamer will seek to increase his degree of faith and closeness to God, and perhaps this will appear clearly in his behavior, which means that if he is attracted to worldly works, he will devote a lot of his time to prayer. And prayer. To God to obtain His love and satisfaction. Moreover, if he loves pleasure by all means, he will choose only permissible pleasure from it, and stay away from all kinds of forbidden pleasures for fear of God and His punishment, and this means that he will be loyal to God and the Messenger. Third: Perhaps the dreamer will soon get He has a high position in his work, and this position may belong to the highest leadership professions in the state. The dreamer can see in his dream that he has engaged in wrong behavior and saw the ruler punishing him in a moderate manner that is closer to advice, and did not use any kind of harsh punishment or verbal violence in a conversation with him that might have caused Embarrassment and internal pain. First: The viewer’s relationship with his manager at work will become stronger, and this is a result of his sincerity and dedication to his work and his great efforts to promote the organization in which he works as a whole. Second: As a result of this strong bond that will exist between the dreamer and his work managers, they will provide him with moral and material support and encouragement, Therefore, he will receive great material rewards and can be promoted soon as a form of recognition. In appreciation of honesty and honesty. If the dreamer sees that the president or ruler is in a bad mood and addresses him with insulting words and harsh criticism, this is a sign of fierce competition that the dreamer will have in waking life, but he will come out. victorious and the result of this victory will be the envy of some because he was able to achieve his goal despite the presence of competitors. If the dreamer sees that he is with the president wherever he goes, this scene shows three symbols: First: He will continue to succeed in life, and according to his age and condition, he will know the success he will achieve in Waking life. If the dreamer is a student or student, this success will be in his field of study. If he is a trader, this is a sign that he will be the strongest in his field of trading and will soon achieve the highest profits. This success could be in the emotional side of a person’s life and indicates that he will continue to A balanced love story will culminate in marriage. Second: Interpreters said that the dreamer will achieve a lot in his life, and this means that

title: Interpretation of a dream about geckos walking on the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about geckos walking on the body in a dream. Some may want to know the interpretation of dreams about geckos walking on the body in a dream. One of the dreams that many wanted to know is the interpretation of this vision. Any involvement in interpretations, but rather from diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a gecko walking on the body in a dream. Seeing a gecko walking on the body in a dream indicates the bad thoughts that the dreamer suffered from during that period. Seeing a gecko walking on the body in a dream may It indicates an illness that may afflict the dreamer in those days and he must seek help from God. Whoever sees in his dream that his stomach was walking on the body and does not feel fear, this may indicate that he is doing some magic and sorcery and he must fear God. Hitting a walking goose could indicate The body in a dream indicates reprehensible things that the dreamer will get and I need to stop it immediately. Interpretation of a dream about walking among green trees in a dream: In the event that one sees that he is walking among green trees, this may indicate the enormous livelihood that the dreamer enjoyed in that Time. Walking among green trees in a dream, we may find that a person has gotten rid of many of the problems that he was suffering from at that time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking among green trees, this may indicate the coming goodness for him and the positive changes that will come to him. It happened in his life at that time. A dream of walking among green trees in a dream may indicate a woman’s upcoming pregnancy or good changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking by crawling in a dream: In the event of his personal opinion that he was crawling, this may indicate To his need to seek knowledge at that time. Crawling in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has to go for Hajj or Umrah during those days. Walking in a dream could indicate hypocrisy in religion or deception and hypocrisy. Whoever sees in his dream that he is crawling on the ground, perhaps It indicates his distance from God Almighty, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about walking with a work colleague in a dream: In the event that someone saw that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate a new project that the person with the vision will enter into during this period. It can Walking with a colleague in a dream indicates success at work and completion of tasks. If a person sees that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate that he is an enthusiastic person who wants to continue his work all the time. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate To get rid of the stress and anxiety that he suffered from in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking to the groom’s wedding in a dream: If one sees that he was walking at the groom’s wedding, this may indicate that the owner of this world is far from the Blessed and Almighty God, and he must repent. And he approaches God. Upon entering the groom’s wedding party, there was a song and dance that could indicate the worries and misfortunes that the dreamer may face in his life in those days. Everyone who sees in his dream that he was at a wedding party

Everyone who sees in his dream that he was at a wedding party

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person dying in a dream

preview.html: Each dream is interpreted differently from the other depending on what the person sees in his dream. In this article, we will tell you many interpretations of seeing a dead person die in a dream from our translator site, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a dead person die in a dream for a single girl When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the deceased dies in an ugly and ugly way. This may indicate that this girl will be exposed to many disasters in the future or will suffer from some serious diseases. It also explains that when an unmarried girl sees a dead bachelor dying in her sleep, this is accompanied by a very loud, ominous sound. This indicates that this single girl is likely to marry someone who admires her, loves her and suits her in the near future. Likewise, when an unmarried girl sees that the deceased dies in a dream. This may indicate that she is thinking about many things and that she is busy. There is another interpretation, which is that if an unmarried girl sees that her father is dead in a dream. This indicates that some happy things will happen. Something that makes her happy and joyful in her life or hears happy news next time. The dream was also interpreted that when an unmarried girl sees that a dead father in The dream is accompanied by severe crying and loud screaming. This indicates that she is likely to marry in the near future and move to live in her home. See also: Interpretation of seeing himself dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dead person die in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that the deceased is dying, accompanied by severe crying, sadness and a lot of screaming. This indicates that she was unable to perform her duties and responsibilities. Whether she is married or in practical life, she always feels tired and bored. It is also possible that when a married woman sees a dead person dying in a dream, it is possible. This indicates that she is constantly trying to make her life calm. It is stable and not accompanied by problems, whether between her or between her family and her husband. Another interpretation of this is that when a married woman sees the deceased dying in a dream. It shows that she will soon become pregnant. Interpretation of seeing the dead person die in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a man sees in a dream that the deceased is dying, and this deceased is sick in the hospital. This vision is unpleasant, it shows the many debts, and the damages that he will lose financially. But when a man sees that the dead person is alive in his sleep, he dies. This vision gives An indication that the man will get a lot of profits or inheritance. While, if one sees in a dream that the deceased is dying, this is painful. This indicates that he is suffering from extreme poverty and is suffering from sadness and poor psychological condition and difficult financial situation. But whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing the dead, and he died in the dream. This vision indicates that he will predict that he will get a promotion at work or enter into new projects. Read also: Seeing a dead child come back to life in a dream The meaning of seeing a dead person die in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that the dead father is dying. This indicates that she will soon become pregnant and that God will bless her with a child who obeys her and honors his family

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy during Ibn Sirin’s engagement

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy during the engagement period: There are many things that happen in the dream that shocked the dreamer and he is very confused in their interpretation, and one of them is when a girl sees that she is pregnant and she may think that this dream has many repercussions for her, so what? Is there any significance in a dream about pregnancy during the engagement period? Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy during the engagement period by Ibn Sirinma Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy during the engagement period? Dreaming about pregnancy during the engagement period shows the girl’s big dreams of building a happy life with her fiancé and creating a good family in which she will feel satisfied and warm. If she sees that she She is pregnant with her fiancé and has given birth to a child, so there will be many crises with this fiancé and she must be patient and think of good solutions so that the differences do not increase if she loves him. Some experts believe that the vision comes to warn the girl of some bad behavior and bad deeds that she is doing, and it is time for her to leave her. So that you do not regret it. Pregnancy in general in a girl’s dream of giving birth can cause many differences and obstacles in her relationship with her fiancé, but in general the period of these problems is short and ends quickly. Therefore, interpretations of seeing pregnancy during the engagement period varied between good and evil, and if the unmarried woman commits some If the relationship between It is really bad and she is suffering from many problems because of her dissatisfaction with her marriage to him, so it can be said that this engagement will not last long. There may be hidden truths in the girl’s life and she is very careful not to reveal them to people, and many surprises occur that cause her secrets to be revealed, which causes many Of the conflicts in its reality. We all know the sins that we commit, and if an unmarried woman falls into many of them and knows them well, she must give God his due, and she must repent, because the matter is a warning of God’s wrath upon her, and this is as Ibn Sirin said. Mentioned in his interpretations of this vision. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy during the period of a virgin’s engagement. It is possible for a virgin girl to see in her dream that she is pregnant without marriage, and experts explain that this vision is not bad for her, but it expresses success in her life and the comfort that will come soon. This girl becomes more capable of facing all the crises she is exposed to and has a positive spirit and avoids weakness when she sees her pregnancy in a dream. There are some expectations from interpreters, which indicate that the person she is carrying or the father of the child is not a fit person for marriage. Interpretation experts are divided. Immediacy about this dream, as some say it is bad, while another group rejects this opinion and says it is a sign of kindness, profit and ease of relationship.

title: Interpretation of the market in a dream by Ibn Sirin - seeing the market in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a market for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, whether he enters the market and buys or shops for Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn. Sherine and more Interpretation of buying in a dream Market If you dream that you are in the market, this means prosperity and expansion of your business. If the market is empty, this portends anxiety and despair. Seeing rotten vegetables or meat in the market means loss in your experiences. If a girl sees the market in a dream, this means that her days will be filled with happy events. Interpretation of seeing the market in a dream. Seeing the market has many symbols and meanings that Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned in interpreting this vision, and the meanings and connotations that the various cases of vision carry. Whoever sees in his dream that the market is full With people, or that a fire has burned from the hay in it, then this vision indicates the sustenance and profit that the dreamer and his family obtain, but in some cases this vision may indicate the hypocrisy into which the fortuneteller and some members of his family have fallen, as the market has been closed and his shops closed, especially if it is seen Cobwebs on those doors or if people and vendors are seen sleeping inside them. The market, this vision indicates the stagnation of the markets and the lack of sales due to the poverty that actually afflicts people. The large and wide market in the dream is a vast world and there is bliss for the dreamer when he is awake, and in some cases seeing the market can indicate sorrows, worries, misfortunes, lies, and committing sins and evils in reality. . . Scenes in doing what is right and forbidding wrongdoing between people in real life. Interpretation of the market from the market in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he went to the market with the intention of buying some commission or completing a deal and making a profit from the sale, but he was unable to do so because he lost in the purchase or sale on his behalf. This vision indicates a bad omen that will come to the dreamer in his life. If the dreamer intends to perform the obligatory Hajj or Umrah while he is awake, then his vision means his inability to perform this duty, but if the dreamer of Hajj or Umrah is awake and it is still prohibited at the time of the vision, then his vision shows: the corruption of Hajj or Umrah, and God knows best, and the fighter or mujahid in the path of God. If he misses buying or selling from the market in his dream, the vision shows that the value of martyrdom for the sake of God has passed. On his behalf, and as for the seeker of knowledge, if he desires to seek knowledge in his wakefulness, his vision shows that he is unable to obtain that knowledge, but the situation in which the priest is outside the scope of the cases mentioned above, that he is, was not in any of them, as it appears His vision is that he missed the church prayer for him while on guard. As for the one who sees in his dream that he goes to the market to buy from it, and buys some supplies from it in a natural and easy way, this vision first indicates that the dreamer will continue to perform collective prayer. In the mosque, and in the event that the dreamer desires to perform the Hajj or Umrah obligation, he will succeed in performing this duty in reality, God willing. Of the different sciences.. As for the Mujahid or the Mujahid in S

title: Interpretation of buying a car in a dream and driving and driving a car in a dream

preview.html: A vision of buying a car for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, used black, new, white and red. I dreamed that I bought a new car by Ibn Sirin. Buying a car in a dream, a new car in a dream.. is one of the dreams that we often have in our dreams and that people constantly look forward to getting Buying a new car is one of our dreams. It carries with us many important meanings and clues that the dreamer must know correctly to focus on the meaning of the dream and all the connotations it carries for the dreamer because it needs a sound and correct interpretation. In our interpretations, we will show you important meanings and connotations of seeing buying a car in a dream according to the great commentator Ibn Sirin, who interpreted it correctly. And complete for all its forms that we see. Interpretation of buying a car in a dream If you see that you are buying a car in a dream, this symbolizes that you will be able to fulfill the desire that you have always wanted. Buying a car in a dream also indicates that you will be able to solve a problem that is bothering you. Reflects the dream of buying a car Your desire to get something that you cannot get in reality. If you see that you are in a car showroom and you choose a car from it to buy, this symbolizes a certain problem that you face in reality and you are in a state of searching for the best solution or the best option to deal with this problem in the most appropriate way. Interpretation Buying a used car in a dream Buying a used car in a dream is evidence of the problems that the dreamer will face in the near future. Seeing buying a used car in a dream also indicates that the dreamer has taken something used before and was not aware of it. A used car in a dream is evidence of The job that the dreamer will get. Buying a used car in a dream also indicates marriage to a widowed or divorced man, or a woman’s marriage to a divorced or widowed man. Seeing a wrecked car in a dream is evidence that you are facing great difficulties. If you dream of buying a used car, this indicates There are difficulties in marriage and work. Interpretation of buying a new car in a dream Buying a new car in a dream is evidence that you are the center of attention of those around you. Buying a new car in a dream also indicates new changes in life. A new car in a dream is evidence of radical changes in the dreamer’s life. A new car in a dream is evidence of unexpected changes in the dreamer’s life. Buying a new car in a dream also indicates happiness and joy in the dreamer’s life. A single man who buys a new car in a dream is evidence of his marriage to an unmarried girl. Buying a new car in a dream is evidence of... The presence of a new emotional relationship in the dreamer’s life. Buying a new car in a dream is evidence of a new job and entering new stages of life. The dream of buying a new car in a dream also indicates the end of problems and fears in general life. A new car in a dream is evidence of a new beginning. Buying a car A new car in a dream also indicates new changes in general life. Buying a luxury car in a dream is evidence of minor changes in life. Interpretation of buying a green car

title: The 10 most important interpretations of seeing a dirham in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a lot of dirhams in a dream? Proof of piety and justice. Interpretation of seeing an engraved dirham in a dream? It indicates that the fortuneteller will learn a new art. What is the interpretation of seeing bad dirhams in a dream? Evidence of hearing bad words. Meaning of seeing a lost and broken dirham in A man’s dream? Evidence of a bad birth injury. What is the interpretation of a married woman’s dream that she has many dirhams? Details of the large amount of money that you obtain and the increase in your livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about a dirham by Ibn Sirin. If one sees himself putting the dirham in a bag, it will be an important day in His life for a close friend. Seeing many dirhams in a dream is evidence of piety and justice. So, seeing a great slanderer in a dream means that the fortuneteller will be satisfied with his religion. After that, seeing engraved dirhams in a dream indicates that the dreamer will learn a new craft. If he sees If a person sees a white dirham in his hand, it means that he will be blessed with a new baby. Interpretation of a dream about a dirham by Al-Nabulsi: Seeing ungrateful dirhams in a dream is evidence of useless talk. Therefore, seeing bad dirhams in a dream is evidence that you are hearing bad talk. If a person sees dirhams in The bag, this indicates that people trust their secrets to the fortune teller. Dreaming of owning silver dirhams is a sign of happiness, joy and joy. Seeing the amount of dirhams is evidence that this fortune teller has obtained a large sum of money. The dirhams falling from the bag to the ground is evidence of death. Seeing a loss A dirham for a man: If a man hears the sound of a dirham in a dream, this indicates that he is a good person. If a man sees an engraved dirham in a dream, but it has an image different from the image of the ruler, this indicates that this person will be the cause of the spread of some heresies. After that, seeing the dirham cut In a dream, there is evidence that the owner of this dream will witness some disputes and disagreements. Seeing an unengraved dirham in a dream indicates that he is a person who deals with piety. So, seeing a lost and broken dirham in a man’s dream is evidence that a bad boy has suffered. If a man sees in a dream that Striking a dirham, this indicates that his wife will give birth to a son. Seeing the correct dirham in a dream is evidence of comfort, obtaining a lot of money and many friendships. Interpretation of a dream of a dirham for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of a dirham, this is evidence of the goodness that she will obtain. Then the married woman sees That she has a lot of dirhams, this is evidence of the large amount of money she gets and the increase in her livelihood. If the dirhams are lost in the dream, this is a sign of losing money.
